comments.General: Each key (except comments) defines an analysis region.
comments.bbox: defines the spatial bounding box [east_lon, south_lat, west_lon, north_lat]
comments.hours: Hours to be used for TEMPO analysis against airnow and pandora
comments.airnow,pandora,tropomi: Defines whether to perform these types of analyses.
comments.tropomi_hours: Defines the hours to test for tropomi. Should nominally be 1:30pm LST
comments.Houston Entry: an example with TropOMI and AirNow
comments.BayonneNJ Entry: an example with TropOMI and Pandora
